comment.body:
Glad you chosen 0N for this new experience!! ^^
Wish you lucky posts and.. WELCOME!!!! :D

It's actually a very difficult choice to make and it requires time...
For me.. The path has been something like Mint > Xubuntu Studio > Arch, where I kept the DE xfce4 :] really _like this Desktop Environment!!_
my more detailed post about: [Link](/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:24:Why+Linux+My+story+about+It.) ^^
